head.title: Chenango Valley Central School District Home

form.name: form1

div.span: Chenango Valley Central School District Closure

span.div: Under the executive order of New York State Governor Andrew Cuomo, Chenango Valley Central School District will now remain closed until May 15, while officials continue to monitor and assess COVID-19.

a.title: Click to go to Digital Learning webpage.
Click to go to Digital Learning webpage.

span.div: Please see our webpage (www.cvcsd.stier.org/CoronavirusInformation.aspx) for information and resources (including district updates, food pick-up sites, social-emotional support and digital learning resources).

div.style: width:935px; margin:0 auto; position:relative; z-index:23px; clear:left;

div.em: We inspire, engage and empower all students to achieve their full potential.

br.i: Thank you to our school community for continued patience, support and understanding as we work together through this evolving situation. The health and safety of our students, staff and

span.i: community continues to be our top priority. For updated statements, along with additional information and resources,

br.span: This event, beginning at 8:20 p.m. (20:20 in military time) on April 24, will be live streamed. For more information, click here.

div.a: Please Make Sure You are "Opted in" to Receive CVCSD Text Message Alerts

br.span: Due to new FCC rulings, in order to continue receiving text message alerts from Chenango Valley Central School District through our alert system, cell phone users will need to approve having these text messages sent to them by "opting in.” See more.
For district updates, information and resources regarding COVID-19, click here.
To visit our district Digital Learning Resources webpage, click here.
For 2020-21 school year pre-K and kindergarten registration information, click here.

div.a: New York State Department of Education Guidance Regarding Regents Cancellation

br.span: Chenango Valley High School seniors received a special surprise on April 16. See more.

img.title: namm foundation best communities for music education logo
img.alt: namm foundation best communities for music education logo
img.a: Chenango Valley Named Among ‘2020 Best Communities for Music Education’

br.span: Chenango Valley has been named among the "NAMM Foundation Best Communities for Music Education" for the second year in a row! See more.

Congratulations to the Chenango Valley boys swim team athletes who finished their season ranked in a three-way tie for first place (with Glen Falls & Albany Academy) in New York State team rankings. Way to go, Warriors!
Chenango Valley invites you to show your #CVWarriorPride with a fun activity. See more.

Elementary Deadline to Order: April 20
High School Deadline to Order: April 17For more information, click here.
Chenango Valley invites you to take part in our Virtual Spirit Week from March 30 - April 3! For more information, click here.

img.title: p d school building 100 years celebration graphic
img.alt: p d school building 100 years celebration graphic
img.span: Port Dickinson School Building - 100 Years Celebration

br.span: Join us to celebrate a school building that has remained a staple in our community for the past century! For more information on the event and how you can help out, click here.
Members of the varsity boys swim team showed hard work and dedication through their successes in the 2020 NYSPHSAA Boys Swimming & Diving Championships on March 6 and 7. See more.

div.em: Keep up the awesome work, Warriors!

span.div: Congrats Chenango Valley Central School District for being ranked among "35 safest school districts in Upstate NY, ranked for 2018" by www.NewYorkUpstate.com!
